::DrillBit::

Breathing heavily, DrillBit rushed, out of the Predacon base, running 
up to KitKat. "Hey, is everyone out?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She looked up at Magmatron. "You can join us at our new base if ou 
> wish."
> 
> She looked up and waited for Destructor to join her and the others 
> outside the old base before it blew up
